title: Hanging Shirt
medium: pen and ink with black wash on paper
credit_line: Bequest of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Peter Blume [1906-1992], Sherman, CT; Durlacher Brothers Gallery, New York, NY, until 1958 [1]; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. [1898-1993] James H. Beal, Pittsburgh, PA, 1958 until February 14, 1987; Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones), Pittsburgh, PA, until April 23, 1993; bequest of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal to Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1994.

Notes:
[1].  See "The Beal Collection of American Art," Carnegie Museum of Art, 1994, p. 69.
